name: Murderd by Word
description:
A random generated puzzle Rouge-Lite.

Move through random generated Forest, escaping zobies, collecting food, and seeting up traps.

You can not really fight, so you're only hope, is to get zobies, to enter Trap, or overrun them.

Controls: LeftA or Left ArrowRightD or Right ArrowDownS or Down ArrowUpW or Up ArrowSet up TrapSpaceBar Have Fun!

(this game wa unity recreacion of game i made in clear c#: https://basment.itch.io/murderd-by-words)
